mapper.select: SELECT DEEMED_CODE ,VAT_TERM ,DEEMED_DIV ,YEAR_OF_ATTR ,DEADLINE ,COM_CODE FROM DEEMED_INPUT_TAX WHERE COM_CODE=#{comCode} AND YEAR_OF_ATTR=#{yearOfAttr} AND DEADLINE='Y' AND VAT_TERM=#{vatTerm}
SELECT FARM_FISH_PUR_CODE ,NUMOF_TXN ,PROD_NAME ,COUNT_FF ,PURCHASE_PRICE ,DEEMED_CODE ,VENDER_CODE ,BIZ_REG_NUM ,VENDER_NAME FROM FARM_FISH_PUR WHERE DEEMED_CODE=#{deemedCode}

SELECT DIV_CODE ,ASMT_SUM ,ASMT_SCHEDULED ,ASMT_CONF ,TARGET_RATE ,TARGET_AMT ,CURR_PUR_AMT ,DED_AMT ,DEDTAX_RATE ,DEDTAX_AMT ,DEDTAX_SUM ,DEDTAX_SCHEDULED ,DEDTAX_MONTH ,DED_TAXRATE ,DEEMED_CODE ,ASMT1 ,ASMT2 ,DEEMED_TYPE ,DEDTAX_TOTSUM ,DEDTAX1 ,DEDTAX2_SUM ,DEDTAX2_SCHEDULED ,DEDTAX2_MONTH ,DED_TAX ,YEAR1_AMT_SUM ,YEAR1_AMT1 ,YEAR1_AMT2 FROM DF_AGRI_PROD WHERE DEEMED_CODE=#{deemedCode}
SELECT DEEMED_CODE ,DEEM_SLIP_CODE ,VENDER_CODE ,SLIP_CODE ,VENDER_NAME ,BIZ_REG_NUM ,EVIDENCE_CODE ,PRO_COUNT ,COUNT1 ,PURCHASE_PRICE ,DEEM_TAX_PRICE FROM DEEM_SLIP WHERE DEEMED_CODE=#{deemedCode}
